content.description:
Pliny on His Uncle and Ancestors

Avunculus meus, idemque per adoptionemadoptio, -onis, f.: adoption pater, historias 
diligentissime scripsit. Invenio autem apud sapientes 
honestissimumhonestus, -a, -um, adj.: honorable esse maiorummaiores, -ium, m.: ancestors vestigia sequi, si modo rectorectus, -a, -um, adj.: right 
itinere ambulaverint.
content.question: Pliny the Elder’s only surviving literary work is an early version of which genre of literature?

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
